description:
A few years back Thunderbird adopted a new and improved donation model, and I've been wanting other projects to do something similar and it seems like KDE Plasma is planning to do so. 

==========Support The Channel==========
► Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon
► Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal
► Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay
► Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

==========Resources==========
Nate Blog: https://pointieststick.com/2024/08/28/asking-for-donations-in-plasma/
Thunderbird Blog: https://blog.thunderbird.net/2023/05/thunderbird-is-thriving-our-2022-financial-report/
KDE Donate: https://kde.org/donate/
Plasma 6 Member: https://kde.org/fundraisers/plasma6member/
KDe Merge Request: https://invent.kde.org/plasma/plasma-workspace/-/merge_requests/4490

=========Video Platforms==========
🎥 Odysee: https://brodierobertson.xyz/odysee
🎥 Podcast: https://techovertea.xyz/youtube
🎮 Gaming: https://brodierobertson.xyz/gaming

======
title: KDE Plasma Copies Thunderbird's Donation Success
